LanguageData.EnableIndicatorNeutralFactions: Enable damage indicators for neutral faction
LanguageData.EnableIndicatorNeutralFactions_Desc: Damage indicators will not show if either instigator or target has no faction.
LanguageData.DisplayPawnsOnly: Only show damage indicators for pawns
LanguageData.DisplayPawnsOnly_Desc: Damage indicators will not show if the target is not a pawn.
LanguageData.DisplayPawnsInstigatorOnly: Only show damage indicators for damage done by pawns
LanguageData.DisplayPawnsInstigatorOnly_Desc: Damage indicators will not show if the instigator is not a pawn. (Natural decay, fire...)
